values: Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 4Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 4

Fruitful ministry doesn’t just produce right knowledge of God, but right feeling for him too. The depth of our theology should be matched by the heights of our affections.Fruitful ministry doesn’t just produce right knowledge of God, but right feeling for him too. The depth of our theology should be matched by the heights of our affections.
